message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this great product that I think you'll really enjoy. I'm offering it to you for $100. What do you think?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Bob, I appreciate your offer but $80 is just too low for me. How about we split the difference and go with $90? I'm still willing to work with you to make this happen.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $90. How about we meet at $85? I'm willing to pay a bit more, but I'm trying to stay within my budget.
